description.part1: To get started, edit <1>src/App.js</1> and save to reload.
description.part2: Switch language between English, French, and Kurdish using the buttons above.

about.title: About Us
about.content: Our application provides multilingual support to enhance user experience. You can easily switch between languages.

features.title: Features
features.content: Enjoy seamless integration and smooth transitions between different languages. Our app is designed to be user-friendly and accessible.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For more information, feel free to reach out to us at contact@example.com.
